message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation
Alice, my turn. Inflation hurts, so let's make this efficient. I propose a larger share for me to account for the rapid devaluation of the money we stand to gain in later rounds.
Come on, Bob, let's meet in the middle. We both lose if we keep going
Alice, time is literally money, and it's disappearing fast. I'm willing to be flexible, but the split needs to reflect the reality of the inflation.  This offer is fair considering the circumstances.
I'm willing to compromise, but I won't give up too much. Inflation hurts us both
Alice, let's be realistic. We're past the halfway point.  This offer gets us both something substantial before the inflation eats away too much more.
